## StencilState.enable() method

Enables or disables the stencil test

**Signature:**

```typescript
enable(b: boolean): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  b | boolean | true if stencil test should be enabled |

**Returns:**

this

self
